content:
System.Configuration.Assemblies Namespace

Definition

The System.Configuration.Assemblies namespace contains classes that are used to configure an assembly.

In this Article

Structs

AssemblyHash

Represents a hash of an assembly manifest's contents.

Enums

AssemblyHashAlgorithm

Specifies all the hash algorithms used for hashing files and for generating the strong name.
AssemblyVersionCompatibility

Defines the different types of assembly version compatibility. This feature is not available in version 1.0 of the .NET Framework.
